categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Dandoran Campaign was a military campaign of the Galactic Civil War. Following the Battle for Tatooine, Alliance High Command sought to understand why the Galactic Empire was interested in the planet Dandoran. Colonel Jennica Pierce was tasked with investigated, and as such dispatched her rebel forces to disrupt the Imperial operations. The campaign began with the destruction of multiple Imperial garrisons on the western continent, but eventually the conflict escalated. During the campaign, Imperial forces occasionally attacked rebel forces on Tatooine.
